header_text: You are shopping at the mall, and in line to check out. When you reach into your pocket, you realize your wallet is missing. You don't know where you misplaced it, and realize that your memory lately has been bad.

elements.text: You reach into the other pocket and think to yourself how easy it is to misplace items. Being compassionate to yourself despite the memory lapse feels...

elements.name: You are shopping at the mall, and in line to check out. When you reach into your pocket, you realize your wallet is missing. You don't know where you misplaced it, and realize that your memory lately has been bad. _Finances_puzzle_word2
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
